albot.grid_based

Class GridBasedGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • albot.AlbotConnection
      • albot.grid_based.GridBasedGame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Connect4Game

    public abstract class GridBasedGame
extends AlbotConnection
    An abstract class that handles shared logic and structures used in grid- and turn based games.
